*Infectra jumps up running behind a bush spitting the mixture out* Infectra=
:....oohhh..... *Infectra moans because she was now getting a stomich ache*=
 *Infectra walks back out and falls on her back*
  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2=
000 5:37 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Plintissa walked around the deser=
t, night was falling (Is it okay for night to fall in Plintissa's area?) an=
d she didn't believe her luck. Her scanner was broken, Artist's scanner was=
 broken or he was too stupid to use it, probably the latter, and she was hu=
ngry, there wasn't anything but sand out here. Now that the sun was going d=
own, it started to cool down and Plintissa was calmed. Plintissa walked on,=
 thinking about how miserable life had been to her, and that it only intend=
ed to get worse, why did she come to this planet anyway? Why did she leave =
Cybertron? She remembered that she did indeed have ONE friend on Cybertron,=
 a friend that loved her with all heart, only problem was, Plintissa didn't=
 love this friend back, because the friend was a fembot. Plintissa's old fr=
iend was eventually killed by some bots in the shadows, never did catch tho=
se creeps neither. She later learned that the murderers were a couple that =
had killed millions, but somehow always illuded the cops. Stupid police, ne=
ver good enough when you need them to be REALLY good, maybe she was expecti=
ng too much. Plintissa seen something but assumed it was a mirage, she assu=
med right...

  Artist walked along the desert, tapping his scanner, it was=
 broken. Either Plintissa's scanner was broken or she was too stupid to use=
 it, probably the latter, he couldn't believe his luck! Artist walked throu=
gh the desert, thinking about how boring his life was, he walked through th=
e desest, he served crippled bots, he hung around, he did good things and n=
ever was even noticed, he was tired of it all! The Maximals needed a hero, =
he brung it to them, they never payed him any mind! Artist held his head in=
 rage, his headache swelling, he snarled a snarl not normally done by wovle=
s. He transformed to Beast mode and ran across the desert, howling and reme=
mbering. He impaled Plintissa on a broken off autogun, he impaled Sinesis t=
he same way, Plintissa blew him to pieces? He screamed in arge and passed o=
ut...

  Dracona walked around the corner, she wouldn't miss the chance to =
screw something up in the Pred base since nobody seemed to be there! Dracon=
a slowly made for the entrance...

  Gangon's spark started going dim and s=
tarted to fade, seeing as how it has been seperated from it's body for so l=
ong...

  Sinesis woke up from Stasis lock and pulled away from Blizzard, i=
n extreme pain, he pulled past Quickstrike andf threw Sinister's parts into=
 a CR Tank. Then falling in himself, going into stasis lock. (Orchid is una=
ble to reply at the moment, so I went ahead and took my characters to the C=
R Chamber, don't want them dead.)

  The Radicons went on eating the stuff =
and Train Wreck took the time to examine it.

  "This was made with poisono=
us verries and poisonous mushrooms." Train Wreck said. Stranato looked at A=
rrow with a "Going to kill" look and stood up. He waved for Arrow to come. =
Arrow started to walk away. Stranato followed him. Arrow ran! Stranato chas=
ed him. Blender and Stronghold shrugged and drank beer.

  "That was still =
good eating." Stronghold said.

  "I don't feel too well." Airbomber said. =
Stronghold and Blender laughed. Train Wreck rolled his eyes and examined th=
e other stuff in the weirf food made by Arrow. Squirrel meat? Weird...

  D=
eemos walked right up to the Maximal base, hoping the autoguns wouldn't fir=
e, and headed toward the entrance...

-------------------------------------=
-----------------------------------------



------------------------------=
------------------------------------------------
